subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: If the Canucks were to lift hockey’s ultimate prize, it would be the first time a Canada-based team did so since 1993. But many Canadians are not as excited as one might think.
snippet: If the Canucks were to lift hockey’s ultimate prize, it would be the first time a Canada-based team did so since 1993. But many Canadians are not as excited as one might think.
